title: My Messages App Displays My Old Name
content:
Hi there!

I am having an issue with my Pixel 4 Messages app. After I send a picture, when I tap on it, it displays a very old name of mine. I do not know how Google has this name on record, and I don't know how to update it. It is my dead name and I really would like to get rid of it.
I have included a photo for reference.
